img_text: 12:36 7 BenFordham @BenFordham Replying to @verbaliza @RuminatingR and @SydneyLive2GB Eliza... you're sounding like a disgruntled former casual employee. Maybe just focus on whatever it is that you're doing and leave me to worry about what I'm doing. I will give a voice to anyone who speaks out against radical lunatics murdering strangers on the street. 13/11/18, 12:21
